body_html:
I am using jupyter notebook to use keras which has tensorflow as backend. I have libcudart.so.8.0 in usr/local/cuda-8.0/ as showed by below:

$ locate libcudart.so.8.0
/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64/libcudart.so.8.0
/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64/libcudart.so.8.0.44

but still, when the import part of keras run, I got

/home/allan/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/pywrap_tensorflow.py in swig_import_helper()
     22         if fp is not None:
     23             try:
---> 24                 _mod = imp.load_module('_pywrap_tensorflow', fp, pathname, description)
     25             finally:
     26                 fp.close()

ImportError: libcudart.so.8.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

Could anyone help?

Could anyone help?
body:
I am using jupyter notebook to use keras which has tensorflow as backend. I have `libcudart.so.8.0` in `usr/local/cuda-8.0/` as showed by below:

```
$ locate libcudart.so.8.0
/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64/libcudart.so.8.0
/usr/local/cuda-8.0/lib64/libcudart.so.8.0.44
```

but still, when the import part of keras run, I got 

```
/home/allan/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/pywrap_tensorflow.py in swig_import_helper()
     22         if fp is not None:
     23             try:
---> 24                 _mod = imp.load_module('_pywrap_tensorflow', fp, pathname, description)
     25             finally:
     26                 fp.close()

ImportError: libcudart.so.8.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
```

Could anyone help?
